posts.post_title: FS: T212 OBAK Type 1 and Type 2’s ( Baum Rookie)
posts.post_content:
Here are some Type 1 and Type 2 T212 Obaks for Pacific Coast League.
Payment by PPFF or PPGS( add 3%)
Individual card shipping cost is $5.00 in the US ( with tracking). Will combine shipping on multiple cards.
All sales final
Message me if interested

1. SPIDER BAUM 1909 Type 1 Rookie Card….SOLD
2. PING BODIE 1910 Type 2……..SOLD
3. FRANK “Pat” EASTLEY 1910 Type 2……SOLD
4. KID MOHLER 1910 Type 2……SOLD
(Note: played more games at 2nd base , 2,871, than anyone in pro ball)
5. HARRY STEWART 1910 Type 2…….$25
6. NICK WILLIAMS 1910 Type 2…….$20
7. HENRY SUTOR (sp SUTER) 1909 Type 2 ……$25

I'll take Ping.
PM sent.
Ben
